name: Pepe Inu
description: Forked from Ethereum with Pulsechain. Pepe Inu is tired of watching everyone play hot potato with the endless derivative PepeShibaPepeGirlCumGMElonKishuTurboAssFlokiMoon coins. The big ballers have had their day. It’s time for the most recognizable meme in the world to take his reign as king of memes.
